com.paydiant.android.bluetooth.ble

Class BLEException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.paydiant.android.core.exception.PaydiantException
            • com.paydiant.android.bluetooth.ble.BLEException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class BLEException
extends PaydiantException
    This class encapsulate exceptions thrown during the BLE operations such as scanning, connecting, reading data etc.
    Since:
    4.9.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
